product_name: La Roche-PosayToleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer UV SPF 30
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsHSA/FSA eligibleLa Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer UV SPF 30 provides all-day hydration and prebiotic benefits for the skin barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsOil-free prebiotic face moisturizer with SPF 30 broad-spectrum UVA/UVB sunscreen protectionLightweight lotion face moisturizer provides all-day hydration to leave the skin feeling smoothIdeal for the face, neck and handsReplenishes the skin barrier after 1 hour with ceramide-3Hydrates, repairs and soothes the skin with glycerin and niacinamideOffers prebiotic benefits to help balance the skin microbiome with a high concentration of La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring WaterSafe for sensitive skinNon-comedogenicDermatologist, allergy and sensitive skin testedKey IngredientsCeramide-3 is a natural component of the skin barrierNiacinamide is a form of vitamin B3 with soothing propertiesGlycerin moisturizes and hydrates the skinLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water provides prebiotic benefits to help rebalance the skin microbiome, and is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant propertiesFormulated WithoutFragranceOilParabensItem 2503390How To UseApply to the face and neck in the morning. For prebiotic benefits, use with Toleriane Double Repair Moisturizer at night.IngredientsActive: Avobenzone 3% (Sunscreen), Homosalate 5% (Sunscreen), Octisalate 5% (Sunscreen), Octocrylene 7% (Sunscreen). Inactive: Water (La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water), Glycerin, Silica, Dimethicone, Niacinamide, Peg-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearic Acid, Stearyl Alcohol, Allantoin, Ceramide Np, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Sodium Hydroxide, Myristic Acid, Myristyl Alcohol, Palmitic Acid, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Disodium Edta, Capryloyl Glycine, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum, T-Butyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Apply to the face and neck in the morning. For prebiotic benefits, use with Toleriane Double Repair Moisturizer at night.
ingredients: Octocrylene 7% (Sunscreen). Inactive: Water (La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water)

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I felt a burning sensation on my face. Stopped using it after one application.

reviews.headline: Loving this Product
reviews.comments: Months ago my cosmetologist recommended this product for my moisturizer. I get microdermabrasion every 5 weeks so I want to keep my face well hydrated. I use it twice a day , morning and nighttime. During the day, I try not to wear heavy makeup, just some blush, mascara, and a little lip gloss. My skin feels and looks dewy. Love this product.

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer
reviews.comments: It's the perfect weight and not greasy, easy to apply

reviews.headline: Not for all skin types
reviews.comments:
I like this moisturizer (IF you dont have combination or oily skin). I really wanted a moisturizer with SPF and while this one is great, it's simply not for all skin types. I have combination skin and by 3 hours after application my entire face is oily. 

The product is very moisturizing and your skin looks great upon application, but if you struggle with oily skin, I'd skip this one.

reviews.headline: I fear they changed the formula…
reviews.comments: This used to be my absolute favorite go to day cream. I bought a new bottle recently and it pills and slothes off my face terribly. This never haopened before.

reviews.headline: Breaks me out
reviews.comments: I loved this product at first. It made me glow, evened skintone, and absorbed much better than my previous spf moisturizer. After about a week of usage, I started getting breakouts that ive never experienced before (i dont really struggle with acne). Painful under the skin zits. I stopped usage and they stopped happening. Started using again and they came back. My skin doesn't usually react so noticeably poorly to something. Can't imagine how bad it would be for someone with acne prone skin.

reviews.headline: Allergic reaction
reviews.comments: I used this back in 2023 for 6 months and didnt have issues. Now using in 2025 i got an allergic reaction and see that others are also experiencing this.

reviews.headline: Skin is glowy!
reviews.comments: Have been using this since 2021 and my skin appreciates it! Use daily and twice a day.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: A great product for my sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: 100% recommend
reviews.comments: This is such a light weight sunscreen. It has no white cast and I have super acne prone skin. This has helped me with my acne. This will certainly be a product I buy over and over again. It never disappoints. So acne girly definitely purchase this it's life changing

reviews.headline: Love this product ever since the first time I tried it
reviews.comments: Ever since I tried it, it works do good and leaves my face nice and soft. I would recommend this to a family member or to a friend.

reviews.headline: Currently my holy grail!
reviews.comments: My skin changes all the time, so I often have to change moisturizers. I have combination skin that leans dry. I also have redness. This product has toned my skin and kept me hydrated through winter and summer months. I do apply it under makeup and have had no issues. I love this stuff!

reviews.headline: Wish I could give ZERO start
reviews.comments: I know everyones skin is different but this product is horrible. I have a rash covering my face after using it twice. I don't have overly sensitive skin and have never had this reaction to any product I have ever used.

reviews.headline: Wish I could give ZERO start
reviews.comments: I know everyones skin is different but this product is horrible. I have a rash covering my face after using it twice. I don't have overly sensitive skin and have never had this reaction to any product I have ever used.

reviews.headline: I'll continue to buy and use this product excellent moisturi
reviews.comments: It's one of the best facial moisturizer

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: When I first heard about them I started to use them and absolutely love them. I used it for a few months, before I looked into the ingredients that they use. You can call me a hippy, but there are some ingredients that I do not want to put on my face.

reviews.headline: Yes I'd buy it again.
reviews.comments: Really like how light and clean this cream feels on my face.

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: I have been using this product since 2020 I love this product it's affordable and high quality I am acne prone with sensitive skin this works fantastic for me. It allows me the moisture without clogging my pores and I've tried everything for skincare.

reviews.headline: Bad for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: This is the first product I've ever tried that immediately burnt my skin as I applied it. My entire face turned red and started burning. I had switched to it from the triple repair cream after learning this was more appropriate for the face. The triple repair did not have the same red/ burning affect.

reviews.headline: So hydrating! but it pills…
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer for its hydrating qualities, but I simply cannot wear it on days when I wear makeup because it pills right off. It also tastes SO bad if any accidentally gets on your lips. It pills even without makeup overtop. I also dont love the tube, I would prefer a pump!

media.headline: Curdles on my skin, left a mess everywhere!
media.caption: From La Roche Posé products

media.headline: I would definitely buy this product again.

faceoff_positive.comments: I never leave reviews about products, but I felt compelled to write this today. I have been using this moisturizer for several months now, and I don't think I can ever live without it. I recently started medication for my acne-prone skin, and it was so difficult for me to find a moisturizer gentle enough for my now dry, flaky skin. Every moisturizer I tried would work for 10 minutes and then soak in and leave my skin irritated and drier than before. But this  provides just the right amount of moisture, leaving my skin looking healthy and glowy all day long, which is a miracle for my skin right now! It also lasts a really long time--the tube may look small but a little bit goes a long way!
faceoff_positive.headline: The Best Moisturizer EVER

faceoff_negative.comments: This product claims to be for all skin types, but I completely disagree. I have combination skin with oily T-zone, sensitive, and mild redness on cheeks. This product is very thick. I'm sure it's because you are suppose to use a good amount for a full sun protection. I would not mind it if it absorbs quickly, but unfortunately it doesn't. It takes 1-2 hours to absorb completely even in the Arizona dry climate. After it does absorb, it leaves my skin really soft. And a big big plus is that it does not cause my skin to break out or cause irritation to my sensitive skin (when used alone without layering). It did cause irritation when I layered it with a different product, so keep that in mind. I really wanted it work, but I don't like the heavy feeling on my face before it absorbs. I'm sure this would work very well on people with dry skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: For dry skin only

rollup.name: Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer UV SPF 30
